edutorium.title: Edutorium
edutorium.description: A modern web application built to deliver fast, responsive learning experiences for classrooms and educators.

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: Understanding user needs, project goals, and technical requirements through stakeholder discussions.

steps.title: Strategy
steps.description: Defining project scope, architecture plan, and setting clear milestones aligned with learning outcomes.

steps.title: Implementation
steps.description: Building key modules such as the learning dashboard, landing page, and classroom features using modern stack.

steps.title: Final Result
steps.description: Delivering a fully functional, responsive learning platform with a seamless user experience for educators.

heroSection.description: When you learn with Edutorium, you don’t just get a platform – you get support from a team dedicated to your learning success. From curated materials, interactive classes, to expert sessions, Edutorium delivers the complete digital learning experience.
